column7: accessed=19 March 2014}}</ref>) is a short story by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]], re-creating the (lost) folk-tale underlying the Norse ''[[Hrólfs saga kraka]]''. The manuscript is held by the [[Bodleian Library]].<ref name=MB>{{HM
